bibl.bibl: Carus, Julius Victor, trans. 1874. Der Ausdruck der Gemüthsbewegungen bei dem Menschen und den Thieren. By Charles Darwin. (German translation of Expression.) 2d edition. Stuttgart: E. Schweizerbart’sche Verlagshandlung (E. Koch).
bibl.idno: WorldCat. Only in German libraries. Publisher’s full name from the Kohle catalogue, vol. 1, item 1126, though that seems to be an 1879 reprint of the 1874 ed: though why they would reprint the 1874 2d ed. not the 1877 3d ed. mentioned by Freeman, I don’t know.
